Verses: 1 kaldhEyarudaiya raajyaththinmEl raajaavaakkappatta mEdhiya kulaththaanaagiya agaaSvEruvin puththiranaana thariyu raajyabaarampaNNugiRa mudhalaam varushaththilE,

2 dhaaniyElaagiya naan erusalEmin paazhkkadippugaL niRaivERiththeera ezhubadhuvarusham sellumendru karththar erEmiyaa theerkkadharisiyOdE solliya varushangaLin thogaiyaip puSthagangaLaal aRindhukoNdEn.
3 naan ubavaasampaNNi, rattilum saambalilum utkaarndhu dhEvanaagiya aaNdavarai jebaththinaalum viNNappangaLinaalum thEda enmugaththai avarukku nEraakki,

4 en dhEvanaagiya karththarai nOkki jebampaNNi, paava aRikkaiseydhu: aa aaNdavarE, ummil anbukoorndhu, ummudaiya kaRpanaigaLaik kaikkoLLugiRavargaLukku udanpadikkaiyaiyum kirubaiyaiyum kaakkiRa magaththuvamum bayangaramumaana dhEvanE,
5 naangaL paavancheydhu, akkiramakkaararaayirundhu, dhunmaarkkamaai nadandhu, kalagampaNNi, ummudaiya kaRpanaigaLaiyum ummudaiya nyaayangaLaiyum vittu agandrupOnOm.

6 umadhuï¿½ naamaththinaalE engaL raajaakkaLOdum engaL prabukkaLOdum engaL pidhaakkaLOdum dhEsaththinudaiya sagala janangaLOdum pEsina theerkkadharisigaLaagiya ummudaiya oozhiyakkaararukku sevikodaamaRpOnOm.

7 aaNdavarE, needhi umakkE uriyadhu; umakku virOdhamaaga seydha dhrOgaththinimiththam ummaalE sameebamum dhooramumaana ellaa dhEsangaLilum thuraththappattirukkiRa yoodhamanusharum erusalEmin kudigaLum sagala iSravElarumaagiya naangaL innaaLil irukkiRapadiyE, vetkam engaLukkE uriyadhu.
8 aaNdavarE, umakku virOdhamaagap paavancheydhapadiyaal, naangaLum engaL raajaakkaLum engaL prabukkaLum engaL pidhaakkaLum vetkaththukkuriyavargaLaanOm.

9 avarukku virOdhamaaga naangaL kalagampaNNi, avar theerkkadharisigaLaagiya thammudaiya oozhiyakkaararaikkoNdu engaLukku munbaagavaiththa avarudaiya nyaayappramaaNangaLinpadi nadakkaththakkadhaaga naangaL avarudaiya saththaththukku sevikodaamaRpOnOm.
10 aanaalum engaL dhEvanaagiya aaNdavaridaththil irakkangaLum mannippugaLum uNdu.

11 iSravElar ellaarum umadhu nyaayappramaaNaththai meeRi, umadhu saththaththukku sevikodaamal vilagippOnaargaL. avarukku virOdhamaagap paavancheydhOm; aagaiyaal dhEvanudaiya dhaasanaagiya mOsEyin nyaayappramaaNap puSthagaththil ezhudhiyirukkiRa saabamum aaNaiyaakkinaiyum engaLmEl soriyappattana.

12 erusalEmil sambaviththadhupOla vaanaththinkeezh engum sambaviyaadhirukkiRa periya theengai engaLmEl varappaNNinadhinaal, avar engaLukkum engaLai nyaayantheerththa nyaayaadhipadhigaLukkum virOdhamaaga solliyirundha thammudaiya vaarththaigaLai niRaivEtrinaar.

13 mOsEyin nyaayappramaaNap puSthagaththil ezhudhiyirukkiRapadiyE indhath theengellaam engaLmEl vandhadhu; aanaalum naangaL engaL akkiramangaLai vittuth thirumbugiRadhaRkum, ummudaiya saththiyaththai gavanikkiRadhaRkum, engaL dhEvanaagiya karththarin mugaththai nOkkik kenjinadhillai.

14 aadhalaal karththar gavanamaayirundhu andhath theengai engaLmEl varappaNNinaar; engaL dhEvanaagiya karththar thaam seydhuvarugiRa thammudaiya kiriyaigaLil ellaam needhiyuLLavar; naangaLO avarudaiya saththaththukkuk sevikodaamaRpOnOm.

15 ippOdhum umadhu janaththai balaththa kaiyinaal egipthudhEsaththilirundhu puRappadappaNNi, innaaLvaraikkum irukkiRapadi, umakku keerththiyai uNdaakkina engaL dhEvanaagiya aaNdavarE, naangaL paavancheydhu, dhunmaarkkaraai nadandhOm.

16 aaNdavarE, ummudaiya sarvaneedhiyinpadiyE, umadhu kObamum ukkiramamum ummudaiya parisuththa parvadhamaagiya erusalEm ennum ummudaiya nagaraththai vittuth thirumbumpadi seyyum; engaL paavangaLinaalum engaL pidhaakkaLin akkiramangaLinaalum erusalEmum ummudaiya janamaagiya naangaLum engaL sutruppuRaththaar yaavarukkum nindhaiyaanOm.

17 ippOdhum engaL dhEvanE, neer umadhu adiyaanudaiya viNNappaththaiyum avanudaiya kenjudhalaiyum kEttu, paazhaaik kidakkiRa ummudaiya parisuththa SthalaththinmEl aaNdavarinimiththam umadhu mugaththaip pragaasikkappaNNum.

18 en dhEvanE, ummudaiya seviyai saaiththuk kEttaruLum; ummudaiya kaNgaLaith thiRandhu, engaL paazhidangaLaiyum, umadhu naamam tharikkappattirukkiRa nagaraththaiyum paarththaruLum; naangaL engaL needhigaLai alla, ummudaiya migundha irakkangaLaiyE nambi, engaL viNNappangaLai umakku munbaaga seluththugiROm.

19 aaNdavarE kELum, aaNdavarE manniyum, aaNdavarE gavaniyum; en dhEvanE, ummudaiya nimiththamaaga adhaith thaamadhiyaamal seyyum; ummudaiya nagaraththukkum ummudaiya janaththukkum ummudaiya naamam tharikkappattirukkiRadhE endrEn.

20 ippadi naan solli, jebampaNNi, en paavaththaiyum en janamaagiya iSravElin paavaththaiyum aRikkaiyittu, en dhEvanudaiya parisuththa parvadhaththukkaaga en viNNappaththai en dhEvanaagiya karththarukku munbaaga seluththikkoNdirundhEn.
21 appadi naan jebampaNNikkoNdirukkumpOdhE, mudhal dharisanaththilE naan kaNda purushanaagiya kaabiriyEl, vEgamaaip paRandhuvandhu, andhippaliyin nEramaagiya vELaiyilE ennaith thottaan.
22 avan enakkuth theLivuNdaakki, ennOdE pEsi: dhaaniyElE, unakku aRivai uNarththumpadi ippOdhu puRappattuvandhEn.

23 nee migavum piriyamaanavan, aadhalaal, nee vENdikkoLLath thodanginapOdhE kattaLai veLippattadhu. naan adhai aRivikkavandhEn; ippOdhum sollugiRa vaarththaiyai nee gavaniththukkEttu, dharisanaththai aRindhukoL.

24 meeRudhalaith thavirkkiRadhaRkum, paavangaLaith tholaikkiRadhaRkum, akkiramaththai nivirththipaNNugiRadhaRkum, niththiya needhiyai varuvikkiRadhaRkum, dharisanaththaiyum theerkkadharisanaththaiyum muththirikkiRadhaRkum, magaa parisuththamuLLavarai abishEgampaNNugiRadhaRkum, un janaththinmElum un parisuththa nagaraththinmElum ezhubadhuvaarangaL sellumpadi kuRikkappattirukkiRadhu.

25 ippOdhum nee aRindhu uNarndhukoLLavENdiyadhu ennavendraal: erusalEmaith thirumba eduppiththukkattugiRadhaRkaana kattaLai veLippaduvadhumudhal, prabuvaagiya mEsiyaa varumattum Ezhu vaaramum, aRubaththiraNdu vaaramum sellum; avaigaLil veedhigaLum alangangaLum maRupadiyum kattappadum; aanaalum idukkamaana kaalangaLil ippadiyaagum.

26 andha aRubaththiraNdu vaarangaLukkup pinbu mEsiyaa sangarikkappaduvaar; aanaalum thamakkaaga alla; nagaraththaiyum parisuththa Sthalaththaiyum varappOgiRa prabuvin janangaL azhiththuppOduvaargaL; adhinmudivu jalapiravaagampOla irukkum; mudivupariyandham yuththamum naasamum uNdaaga niyamikkappattadhu.

27 avar oru vaaramaLavum anEgarukku udanpadikkaiyai uRudhippaduththi, andha vaaram paadhi sendrapOdhu paliyaiyum kaaNikkaiyaiyum ozhiyappaNNuvaar; aruvaruppaana settaigaLOdE paazhaakkugiRavan vandhu iRanguvaan, nirNayikkappattirukkiRa nirmoolam paazhaakkugiRavanmEl theerumattum soriyum endraan.
